name: FrouBot
description: FROUBOT ($FROBOT) is a project introduced in DeFi space that allows users to trade and manage all your cryptocurrency exchange (CEX) transactions through a Telegram bot. The bot includes TradingView integration and Auto trading as well!! Currently, the bot is exclusively compatible with Binance, KuCoin, ByBit, OKX but we plan to gradually integrate other exchanges. A discord bot with similar functionality is under work. The bot is currently free to use and test. LP IS LOCKED FOR 1 YEAR. Bot: t.me/crypto_FrouBot
